Hey those girly shower scrubber things aint just for girls. They do wonders cleaning your skin.

Wow, fuck that. You have nobody that could drive and get you, or is flying cheaper in the US? I have no idea how far away California is away from where you lived, but I know if my friend was in shit like that in the UK I'd take them away from it all. Hope you sort it out.

Andy the Randy Vandy from the sounds of it.
I agree. Chatterwhite goes with a lot of the coloured cloaks and I'd like the ability to keep that colour.

I suggested the other day that the unused Special Orders could be used for this. Hey maybe it will when she returns.
Should've just dropped the damage of the ones that drop and the ones you can buy. Leave the aquired ones alone.

I can sort of understand the price but I would like to know if armour pieces are going to be available as legacy engrams at some point as I'm missing one or two from the end of Y1 where I stopped playing as much.

I didn't downvote him. I'm not pety. I merely misunderstood what he was referring to.

They could just fill it full of taken enemies and add more grimiore and ghosts to find. Make it relevant again as well as giving more insight into it all. Most people love the whole raid area and it's concept. Edit-didn't type enough
Yeah I don't really understand why they are less powerful in terms of infusion. Maybe because of the whole Three of Coins thing I guess.

Yeah. I mean, just essentially "reskin" the raid with taken enemies and boost the difficulty to current levels. Just to make it relevant again. Hell I'd be happy with a 290 LL version and maybe throw some ghost in for good measure. Anything lol

They're ok for year one content and standard crucible stuff. Stuff you have, that has a year 2 version, can be bought from the appropriate kiosks in the Vanguard room. Weapons are 150 marks and gear is 125 I think.
Ahh that's a good way to remember it. Thanks.
That's the weekly one though. It's not gonna stop being there. You can complete any combination of 10 daily ones to get it done.
I would've thought it was from them glitching with the dropped blight bombs, similar to the way the shank teleports in the SABRE strike and the trap door.
The strategy i know a few use is a titan drops a blessing bubble mid and use that to MToM the ogres.
I had never had this happen until the challenge where people have adjusted their strategies.
I've had issues finding players on Xbox one. On strikes, crucible, tower etc etc. A hard reset rectified the issue.
I accidentally dunked the wrong sister once, realised that we could kill it and it went smoothly. Maybe this is the reason why.
You can use a bond/mark/cloak with the respective heavy boost as opposed to a telemetry.
A proper, full peer-to-peer model could potentially be far superior then any client server or hybrid type model but it would be very difficult to design and implement.

They say this is a P2P model, but is it really? I was taught that a P2P model is pretty much going to be a full mesh with each client communicating with every other client, but Destiny (as with pretty much every other multiplayer game) has a server client model, with the server running on the same machine as the client. This is why someone gets host advantage. Isn't this the infrastructure that Destiny uses? Just seeing your perspective on it as I know if I tried to claim console gaming wasn't P2P like most people think it would be shot down in flames lol. Maybe I am wrong. As I said, just wondered what your perspective was.
I think he means the same way they have scaled the Nightfall and other activities each time a major update comes out. Not so much automatic as they adjust it.
It's almost like they started to implement something and stopped.
I too tend to find thing the week prior to Xur selling them to. I have wondered if the drops rates increase or I'm just lucky/unlucky.
The very small solo segments of some of TTK quests might be them moving to a more broad approach of content for future titles.
You underestimate the importance of Internet points.
I prefer the challenge mode strat for Oryx but I see so many teleporting ogres :(
If the bottle design permits. You wanna squeeze it so it sucks the air in then expels it.
I'm totally up for that, what's your PSN ID, I will add you if that ok.
Cheers. I've sent you an invite. I've played them all multiple times on Xbox. Would like to just collect gear on the PS4 now.
That feature would be of great use to me and my laziness too.
You can also do the level 34 PoE edit-oh I see that was already mentioned when I loaded more comments lol
I thought it was 60%?
People tend to confuse P2P with client hosted, servers. I think Destiny is in fact a client-server type architecture for the reason you pointed out, host advantage type issues.
I think it's because they never mentioned more PvE content until now. I know it's vague, annoyingly so, but at least there is something coming... I guess.
I agree. Their way to drag it out so we don't get bored so quickly.

I thought of anSRL type book, but more of a sticker book where if you had the item it would become a sticker and you could always collect the weapon or armour piece with those stats, but change it so you couldn't gain from dismantling stickered items.
You always get a 310 shell and another weapon or armour piece as a rank 5 reward.

Pretty sure Columbus Circle is coming but that isn't a great amount of square footage
I've got this same issue. I'm wondering if they've neglected to implement it.

I started using TG on Windows Phone and although I have all the available managers on iPad, I still tend to use TG as that's what I'm accustomed to. I only really use the item transfer functionality of the application so it performs well enough for my requirements.

Yep was in the same boat as you and OP.

WRITING.TITLE: Synced Film Watching
WRITING.TEXT: This might be a bit of an oddball question but I was wondering if any of you guys used any this so you could watch/share a film in sync. My SO an I have watched stuff together, sometimes it stays synced but other times it doesn't, it depends on the source media usually. Anyway, any help will be greatly appreciated.
I hope you work through this. You just have to remember it's only temporarily.
Thanks. Netflix is an option. We have used Xbox primarily but thank you for this suggestions. We will give them a whirl.

How and why did you decide to get married without knowing you could be with each other immediately after? I'm genuinely curious. I could see me being in a similar position and I'm just curious why you decided upon this course of action.
Ahh ok thanks for explaining. I guessed it might've been that sort of reason.
This will be me soon. I'm dreading leaving her and going home. I know I'm not going to deal with it particularly well.
Why would you wait. You don't spend as much time together doing what you want as it is. Why waste a day that you'll be together still not enjoying yourselves.

Wow, I'm sorry to hear what has happened. I know first hand depression can rule your life. I'm glad to see you are fighting it. I wish you all the best for the future my friend. You need to believe in yourself. You're a handsome chap who appears to be levelled headed. I think you could have a bright future. I should certainly heed my own advice..
Do it almost every day. Thought it was a bit weird at first but it's nice when I wake up and go to work and I can say "good bye" and "love you" before I leave.

Pretty much in the same boat as you. I look at the prices everyday. Today they've dropped from about #163;720 to #163;520. Do I buy now or do I hold out. I've never really bought plane tickets before...
I adore getting letters. Enquirer into how much shipping a small gift is. What date is your anniversary?
Wow that's more than I thought it would be.
I feel like that sometimes. Keep persevering through it. We are all in a similar position on this board so we should all support one another.

I wouldn't agree with guys not thinking about their SO all the time, I think about mine all the time. Everyone is different though. Also I have only had 2 slight disagreements with my SO in the time we've been together, I don't think 2 fights a week sounds normal. You need to explain that in this current state, him not making the effort to talk to you isn't going to work for you as a couple as it's clearly stressing you out. That isn't what a relationship is suppose to be about, they're suppose to make you happy and put you first. That's my opinion anyway. The idea of pestering you for "nudes" though. That's not on. Unless you're in a good relationship, that just sounds as though they're using you, I could be wrong, I don't know the dynamic of your relationship.
Way more interesting than I was expecting. Also noticed you love break things or blowing stuff up lol.
All the best with this. If you truly love one another and come to terms with not seeing each other as often then there no reason that it won't work. It will just be different for a while.

I don't think you're coming off as needy at all. If anything quite the opposite. You're seeming very structured in your approach of this relationship. Maybe that will work for you both. I know personally though, I want my SO to message me all the time, so I guess I'm quite needy lol. Everybody is different, you just need to work out what is best for you both. If it's working, continue with it.
Do you know what this person looks like? Friends on Facebook or something?

Ahh ok. I thought maybe the only thing you knew about this person was what they had told you. Maybe this person didn't like their own voice. Maybe they can't afford a mic. Maybe they're really shy. Could even live with people that wouldn't like then being in a relationship. It could be one of a million possible things.

Potentially, but we done know the context of the pictures and videos they have received. They could both converse in their videos. Only they know if the other person is genuine. If I was sending messages to my SO saying "I love you Jess" and telling her about my day, that would be coupley. They may be receiving videos like this. If the video doesn't seem personal, even without speech then hopefully they know that something is suspect. We don't really know what is going on.
My SO and I have Pinterest boards. They're quite fun #128512;
I wake up looking for her and she hasn't even been here #128542;
Ahh I'm sorry to hear this. This is a concern of mine to. The other side of the world is a pain #9785;

WRITING.TITLE: Wrapping Presents
WRITING.TEXT: Is it worth wrapping presents to be sent from UK to US? I don't want to bother if customs are just going to open them all.
Ahh ok, super, thank you very much #128522;
Thank you. I just assumed they'd open everything. I've never sent gifts abroad.
I'd like to participate but I'm not a student. Good luck with the research. I live close to your university, in the grand scheme of things at least.
I agree with the dinosaur.

I shop every other day, but I still think I'm going to do this.... actually, it would cost me about #163;200 a year with cheap cards.... not that she isn't worth that. I could spend it wisely. Maybe once a week.
I'm sorry to hear this story. Dependency on something can ruin a life and other involved. I hope you find love somewhere else and become happy in your future.

When I was half way through I wanted to just comment and tell you this isn't a healthy relationship. I did read through to the end. You're not happy in this relationship, even if you do love this person. You could be happier with someone that will reciprocate the happy feelings you want. I hope you either leave this toxic relationship, regardless if he is at fault (it's not working) or you both rectify this and become happy.

I don't need to be thanked. I just don't think anyone should go through a relationship that isn't healthy for them. You only know in your own heart if this is truly salvageable, but if you cannot see happiness with this person then surely you should cut ties and wait for someone that will make you happy. There isn't anything wrong with being single, could that even be a happier expierience for you?

I haven't got anything and neither has my SO. I paid about $100 to have it shipped there quickly but it got detained in customs and that is closed for Christmas so there isn't anything I can do. At least we have each other, better than material things I guess.
It's something that will make Christmas seem longer. At least that's how I'm looking at it lol

I could never forgive that. I couldn't even forgive a drunken mistake but that's just me. He should have given in to your request to look through his phone with you. I would do that with my SO if she asked but I would never give her a reason to question me initially. I hope you work through this and do whatever will make you happy.

Don't break communication with him hoping it will help and trying to get "better" during that time. Trying to work through mental issues takes a lot of time and I doubt you'll sort your head out in less than a month. You want to talk through things with him, you should be there for each other through times of hardship.

I know what you mean. I don't think you were too trusting. You need to trust your SO, it's part of being in a healthy relationship, it's just a shame they abused that trust you gave them. I understand your insecurities though. I hope you never get treated like this again.

I remember the first time my SO and I used FaceTime. It was slightly awkward but now we video chat almost every day, maybe everyday, we talk a lot too. Sometimes we video chat a few times a day. It gets a lot easier, quite quickly to I may add.

How old are you? How many years is it until you can start working? I think you may need to elaborate on his circumstances slightly. It sounds as though it could be potential for issues and would be difficult for people to dispense advice without knowing.

Try the spicy tuna hand roll. In all seriousness, if you're both comfortable enough, I echo the sentiments of others and comminicate. Ask her what she likes whilst you're doing it. You'll both end up enjoying things a lot more.
Maybe he will ring you. When I go out im always on the phone to my SO and if I had gone out tonight I was planning on ringing her at 12 anyway. So hopefully he will do the same.
Maybe she realised how difficult it would be to have feelings that strong for someone that is so far away. I know it's not great, I hope you feel better soon buddy #9785;
Haha, this is so my SO and I. Did you make the video. If so kudos. It did make me chuckle.
Keep it up. #128512;
I hope it went well.

Everyone is different. There is no correct answer here. Some people only go 6-8 hours without connect, others talk every couple of days. You have to look at this from your own perspective. It sounds as though this may not be enough for you.

You have put up with more than enough. I could understand a day or two without communication but at some point that person should become unbusy enough to message the person that is suppose to be important. I know it's going to be tough at first but once you move on and find someone that will treat you how you want to be treated, you'll be happier than you ever have been and you'll realise how you should have ended this relationship long before you become so hurt.
You're not dumb, you were optimistic is would return to what it was initially. We do silly things when we love someone. Don't be hard on yourself. At least it was 8 months, not 8 years or worse.

This sub Reddit isnt busy enough to start restricting what people can post. It's unnecessary in my opinion. As sickening as it is (I joke) to see pictures of people with their SO's when I'm alone, it's comforting to know people are meeting one another. That to me is a positive use of this virtual space.
I chuckled far too much!!

Don't think they could do better. You can't honestly say that you aren't possibly the best for that person. I'm sorry to hear that this hasn't worked out for you, it is difficult, I'd admit that. I hope you find happiness in the future.

I'm incredibly afraid of being cheated on but to my knowledge I've never been cheated on and I'd never cheat on anyone. I idolise my partners and even if I was in a point where a relationship has failed I'd still never do that. I think some people might just be that insecure.
Ahh ok, I understand.
Some people add other people on facebook they don't even know, so the idea of you adding your partners parents isn't that weird. Especially if you get on with them.
He has already said it's fine. Maybe mention to him to suggest to them to add you. That might make it feel less weird for you. They might barely use it anyway so this worry would be for nothing.

WRITING.TITLE: UK to US Travel Documents
WRITING.TEXT: I thought this might be one of the best places to ask. I am travelling to the US from the UK next month. I havent been to America before, I want to make sure I get all the correct documentation and other thing so that I am allowed into the country and have a pleasant trip. I've got an ePassport and I know I need to get an ESTA. As well as getting travel/health insurance, is there anything else I need to get. I appreciate any help. Thank you.
Thank you very much for your help. I appreciate it.

Tell him that talking to him is important and you'd like him to ask you to talk to you again, when he feels comfortable. If I were him I'd also want to be told that you would've cancelled your class mate in order to talk to me.

This doesn't fill me with confidence. I've never flown with a lay over before and I booked my ticket to SC and it has a stop in Atlanta for 42 minutes and an hour and 17 minutes on the return... #9785; #65039;
Yeah I have a feeling this may be the case, thank you.
Thank you, I shall. I will grab that app, thank you for the advice.
I'd love to even be within a 2 hours drive of my SO. What a shit excuse that is. Hope your friend is alright.
Sorry to hear it didn't work out. He doesn't sound easy to get on with if he can't accept your taste in things. Hope you move past this and find happiness.

TBH a router doesn't really have anything to do with wireless. A router just directs the network traffic, essentially. You get 'routers' with built in wireless access points, network switches, modems. The router we all know and love is usually a box with a bunch of tech inside as well as a router.

If clients connect to one host, it's client server, even if the server is hosted on a client machine. It's sometimes called a listen-server.

ADSL(1) can't go at 3.5MB/s. is your 60Mb connection synced at 60? You should be getting more than that if it is. About double that.
3.5Mb/s is less than quarter of the speed of 16Mb.

Sorry, my first sentence was just stating that what the OP said would've been 3.5Mb/s as ADSL cannot reach 3.5MB/s speed. You should be able to look on your router and see the speed the connection has synced at. Usually they will say you can get up to 60Mb, but rarely reach that. I was just curious what your actual connection was running at.

It's also a soccer ball, because it's a ball used in soccer. We, the British people, were believed to have been the people that created the word soccer.
They call it soccer because we named it that. Just because we refer to it as football here doesn't mean it cant also be referred to as soccer.
Oxford "er" slang. Er was added to the end of soc, the abtiviation of soccer. The same sort of slang that the word ruggers is derived from for rugby.

WRITING.TITLE: Domain Trust Relationship Failure
WRITING.TEXT: Hi. Having issues with a primary and a trusted domain Trust breakdown. Recreated the trust everyway I can think imaginable. Turned off SID filter which I now don't have access to do anymore. One domain cannot authenticate to the other domain but allows incoming connections. Rebuilding the trust does nothing even though it validates. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
I should add you can login to either domain account from either domain machine fine. It is just file access that has the domain trust issue.

After. I managed to recreate the trust, albeit broken, and disable SID filtering. After recreating again it denied me access when trying to disable SID. I'm not on site at the moment but we went relying on it, I just wondered if would help with the issue.

WRITING.TITLE: DFS Server Target at User Level
WRITING.TEXT: I'm working at a three site school trust. They have a replicated DC at each site and DFS is configured to share network installed software etc. They didn't want everyone as a replicated user due to the storage that would be required so only senior management and a few other have replicated files per site. When none replicated users visit another site (this is rare) and login, they want to view their documents but the vFS creates a new desktop, downloads etc on the 'local' domain so they cannot access their files. Is it possible to apply a preferred DFS server to certain OUs on the DC, or another work around. Many thanks
The name space for the users points to all three servers and it connects to the site you are situated at. When this happens though, the files that the user has is on the server at the other school.

Yeah, that is how it is configured. All three sites are configured with the same name space and it will point to the user folder on the local server. None of these folders or users are replicated, I think I may have confused things when I mentioned replication. I was just hoping there was a way that you could prioritise a particular server on a name share for a set of users.

gt;hen in AD where your users are stored, create an OU for each facility. Put the users of said facility in that OU. Then create a drive mapping GPO for say H: drive \(home\). Create 3 different item level targets for that drive, using the facility OU that the users are in to map that facilities drive share. Then no matter which PC that user logs into their H: drive would always be mapped to their home facility. Yeah, I am unsure why there is a shared user folder, although it gives you a small amount of redundancy in that where ever you login, you will have a 'home' even if it doesn't have your files. They all have local shares for the user folder for each facility so I think I will just give them a mapped drive they can access that contains their actual files when ever they are off site. Thank you very much for your assistance.
